name: White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies-actual original CC cookies-Becky Browning
steps: Cream butter and sugars. Add egg and vanilla and mix until fluffy. Combine dry ingredients and then add to wet ingredients.
Bake at 365 for 6-8 minutes. Make sure the tops are no longer glistening, but not browned. Leave on cookie sheet to cool for a few minutes.
